verses.name: Jeremiah 23:26
verses.text: How long shall this be in the heart of the prophets that prophesy lies? yea, they are prophets of the deceit of their own heart;

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:27
verses.text: Which think to cause my people to forget my name by their dreams which they tell every man to his neighbour, as their fathers have forgotten my name for Baal.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:28
verses.text: The prophet that hath a dream, let him tell a dream; and he that hath my word, let him speak my word faithfully. What is the chaff to the wheat? saith the Lord.
